song.title: Arcadia 2
song.info:
#basehead/klf 1994 #deephouse in yer face
this is an overhaul/remix of the cool original tune by necros/pm, and is composed for the diskmag dissonance #2
hopefully i did more than a little justice to the original...
the samples (besides the ones taken from the original module) are from: unity 3, plastik man, and d-shake.
enjoy the song.
